text.text: These new gold properties have our geologists very excited about the 2022 field season. There are multiple geological features that are of extreme interest including three major fault structures: the Larder Lake Cadillac Deformation Zone 1km to the north, the Amikougami Creek Fault 5km to the east, and over 2km of the Eby-Otto Fault trending north-easterly through the property.
